section.section:
Except as otherwise provided in this section, societies are:
governed exclusively by this subtitle; and
exempt from the other insurance laws of the State.
A statute enacted after December 31, 1963, does not apply to societies unless the statute expressly states that it applies to them.
In addition to the provisions of this subtitle, societies are subject to the provisions of Title 13, Subtitle 5 of the Estates and Trusts Article.
